headline: Solar Foods opens first commercial-scale gas-protein factory in Finland
summary: 20 000 t/y facility uses CO₂ + renewable electricity to make Solein powder for plant-based meats and lab-grown dairy.

headline: MycoWorks opens South Carolina mycelium leather Reishi plant ahead of schedule
summary: 300 000 sq-ft Union facility brings Fine Mycelium Reishi output to millions of sq ft/year for Hermès, GM collaboration.

headline: Perfect Day secures GRAS status for precision-fermentation β-lactoglobulin
summary: FDA no-objection clears path for expanded U.S. retail rollout of animal-free whey protein ice-creams and cream cheeses in late 2025.

headline: Formo raises $87M Series C as Germany green-lights precision-fermented cheeses
summary: Largest European funding round to date accelerates market launch of mozzarella and ricotta analogues via recombinant casein from yeast.

headline: Ecovative raises $70M for mycelium foam packaging and insulation lines
summary: Funding drives rollout of Forager mycelium insulation boards to replace polyurethane in two U.S. modular-home factories by 2026.

headline: Superbrewed’s Postbiotic Cultured Protein approved for EU market
summary: Bacterial biomass gains Novel Food authorization allowing fish-free surimi, cheese analogues, and protein bars across 27 EU member states.

headline: Change Foods partners with Almarai for Middle East dairy-free rollout in 2026
summary: UAE-Saudi dairy giant will distribute animal-free cheeses based on Change Foods’ microbial casein across 4000 retail stores.

headline: Bolt’s Mylo mycelium granted USDA BioPreferred certification
summary: Label opens U.S. federal procurement channel expected to expand demand for mushroom-based leather in military and consumer goods.

headline: Bacterial-cellulose shoes hit market with Stella McCartney capsule
summary: Limited edition sneakers use kombucha-derived cellulose leather, showcasing scalability via 10 000-pair global drop.
